verses.verse: For the Law,<WG3551> since it has<WG2192> [only] a shadow<WG4639> of the good<WG18> things<WG18> to come<WG3195> [and] not the very<WG846> form<WG1504> of things,<WG4229> can<WG1410> never<WG3763> by the same<WG846> sacrifices<WG2378> year<WG1763> by year,<WG1763> which<WG3739> they offer<WG4374> continually,<WG1336> make<WG5048> perfect<WG5048> those<WG3588> who draw<WG4334> near.<WG4334>

Otherwise,<WG1893> would they not have ceased<WG3973> to be offered,<WG4374> because<WG1223> the worshipers,<WG3000> having once<WG530> been cleansed,<WG2511> would no<WG3367> longer<WG2089> have<WG2192> had<WG2192> consciousness<WG4893> of sins<WG266>?
But in those<WG846> [sacrifices] there is a reminder<WG364> of sins<WG266> year<WG1763> by year.<WG1763>
For it is impossible<WG102> for the blood<WG129> of bulls<WG5022> and goats<WG5131> to take<WG851> away<WG851> sins.<WG266>

Therefore,<WG1352> when He comes<WG1525> into the world,<WG2889> He says,<WG3004> "Sacrifice<WG2378> and offering<WG4376> Thou hast not desired,<WG2309> But a body<WG4983> Thou hast prepared<WG2675> for Me;
In whole<WG3646> burnt<WG3646> offerings<WG3646> and [sacrifices] for sin<WG266> Thou hast taken<WG2106> no<WG3756> pleasure.<WG2106>
"Then<WG5119> I said,<WG3004> 'Behold,<WG2400> I have<WG2240> come<WG2240> (In the roll<WG2777> of the book<WG975> it is written<WG1125> of Me) To do<WG4160> Thy will,<WG2307> O God.<WG2316>'"

After saying<WG3004> above,<WG511> "Sacrifices<WG2378> and offerings<WG4376> and whole<WG3646> burnt<WG3646> offerings<WG3646> and [sacrifices] for sin<WG266> Thou hast not desired,<WG2309> nor<WG3761> hast Thou taken<WG2106> pleasure<WG2106> [in them]" (which<WG3748> are offered<WG4374> according<WG2596> to the Law<WG3551>),

then<WG5119> He said,<WG3004> "Behold,<WG2400> I have<WG2240> come<WG2240> to do<WG4160> Thy will.<WG2307>" He takes<WG337> away<WG337> the first<WG4413> in order<WG2443> to establish<WG2476> the second.<WG1208>
By this<WG3739> will<WG2307> we have been<WG1510> sanctified<WG37> through<WG1223> the offering<WG4376> of the body<WG4983> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> once<WG2178> for all.<WG2178>

And every<WG3956> priest<WG2409> stands<WG2476> daily<WG2596> <WG2250> ministering<WG3008> and offering<WG4374> time<WG4178> after<WG4178> time<WG4178> the same<WG846> sacrifices,<WG2378> which<WG3748> can<WG1410> never<WG3763> take<WG4014> away<WG4014> sins;<WG266>
but He, having offered<WG4374> one<WG1520> sacrifice<WG2378> for sins<WG266> for all<WG1336> time,<WG1336> sat<WG2523> down<WG2523> at the right<WG1188> hand<WG1188> of God,<WG2316>
waiting<WG1551> from that time<WG3062> onward<WG3062> until<WG2193> His enemies<WG2190> be made<WG5087> a footstool<WG5286> for His feet.<WG4228>
For by one<WG1520> offering<WG4376> He has perfected<WG5048> for all<WG1336> time<WG1336> those<WG3588> who are sanctified.<WG37>
And the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> also<WG2532> bears<WG3140> witness<WG3140> to us; for after<WG3326> saying,<WG3004>

"This<WG3778> is the covenant<WG1242> that I will make<WG1303> with them After<WG3326> those<WG1565> days,<WG2250> says<WG3004> the Lord:<WG2962> I will put<WG1325> My laws<WG3551> upon their heart,<WG2588> And upon their mind<WG1271> I will write<WG1924> them," [He then says],
"And their sins<WG266> and their lawless<WG458> deeds<WG458> I will remember<WG3403> no<WG3756> <WG3361> more.<WG2089>"
Now<WG1161> where<WG3699> there is forgiveness<WG859> of these<WG3778> things,<WG3778> there is no<WG3765> longer<WG3765> [any] offering<WG4376> for sin.<WG266>
Since therefore,<WG3767> brethren,<WG80> we have<WG2192> confidence<WG3954> to enter<WG1529> the holy<WG40> place<WG40> by the blood<WG129> of Jesus,<WG2424>
by a new<WG4372> and living<WG2198> way<WG3598> which<WG3739> He inaugurated<WG1457> for us through<WG1223> the veil,<WG2665> that is, His flesh,<WG4561>
and since [we have] a great<WG3173> priest<WG2409> over<WG1909> the house<WG3624> of God,<WG2316>

let us draw<WG4334> near<WG4334> with a sincere<WG228> heart<WG2588> in full<WG4136> assurance<WG4136> of faith,<WG4102> having our hearts<WG2588> sprinkled<WG4472> [clean] from an evil<WG4190> conscience<WG4893> and our bodies<WG4983> washed<WG3068> with pure<WG2513> water.<WG5204>
Let us hold<WG2722> fast<WG2722> the confession<WG3671> of our hope<WG1680> without<WG186> wavering,<WG186> for He who promised<WG1861> is faithful;<WG4103>
and let us consider<WG2657> how to stimulate<WG3948> one<WG240> another<WG240> to love<WG26> and good<WG2570> deeds,<WG2041>

not forsaking<WG1459> our own<WG1438> assembling<WG1997> together,<WG1997> as is the habit<WG1485> of some,<WG5100> but encouraging<WG3870> [one another]; and all<WG5118> the more,<WG3123> as you see<WG991> the day<WG2250> drawing<WG1448> near.<WG1448>

For if we go on sinning<WG264> willfully<WG1596> after<WG3326> receiving<WG2983> the knowledge<WG1922> of the truth,<WG225> there no<WG3765> longer<WG3765> remains<WG620> a sacrifice<WG2378> for sins,<WG266>
but a certain<WG5100> terrifying<WG5398> expectation<WG1561> of judgment,<WG2920> and the fury<WG2205> of a fire<WG4442> which will<WG3195> consume<WG2068> the adversaries.<WG5227>
Anyone<WG5100> who has set<WG114> aside<WG114> the Law<WG3551> of Moses<WG3475> dies<WG599> without<WG5565> mercy<WG3628> on [the testimony of] two<WG1417> or<WG2228> three<WG5140> witnesses.<WG3144>

How<WG4214> much<WG4214> severer<WG5501> punishment<WG5098> do you think<WG1380> he will deserve<WG515> who has trampled<WG2662> under<WG2662> foot<WG2662> the Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> and has regarded<WG2233> as unclean<WG2839> the blood<WG129> of the covenant<WG1242> by which<WG3739> he was sanctified,<WG37> and has insulted<WG1796> the Spirit<WG4151> of grace<WG5485>?
For we know<WG3609> Him who said,<WG3004> "Vengeance<WG1557> is Mine,<WG1699> I will repay.<WG467>" And again,<WG3825> "The Lord<WG2962> will judge<WG2919> His people.<WG2992>"
It is a terrifying<WG5398> thing<WG5398> to fall<WG1706> into the hands<WG5495> of the living<WG2198> God.<WG2316>
But remember<WG363> the former<WG4387> days,<WG2250> when,<WG1722> <WG3739> after being enlightened,<WG5461> you endured<WG5278> a great<WG4183> conflict<WG119> of sufferings,<WG3804>

partly,<WG3778> <WG3303> by being made<WG2301> a public<WG2301> spectacle<WG2301> through reproaches<WG3680> and tribulations,<WG2347> and partly<WG1161> by becoming<WG1096> sharers<WG2844> with those<WG3588> who were so<WG3779> treated.<WG390>

For you showed<WG4834> sympathy<WG4834> to the prisoners,<WG1198> and accepted<WG4327> joyfully<WG5479> the seizure<WG724> of your property,<WG5225> knowing<WG1097> that you have<WG2192> for yourselves<WG1438> a better<WG2909> possession<WG5223> and an abiding<WG3306> one.
Therefore,<WG3767> do not throw<WG577> away<WG577> your confidence,<WG3954> which<WG3748> has<WG2192> a great<WG3173> reward.<WG3405>
For you have<WG2192> need<WG5532> of endurance,<WG5281> so<WG2443> that when you have done<WG4160> the will<WG2307> of God,<WG2316> you may receive<WG2865> what<WG1860> was promised.<WG1860>
For yet<WG2089> in a very<WG3745> little<WG3398> while,<WG3745> He who is coming<WG2064> will come,<WG2240> and will not delay.<WG5549>
But My righteous<WG1342> one<WG1342> shall live<WG2198> by faith;<WG4102> And if<WG1437> he shrinks<WG5288> back,<WG5288> My soul<WG5590> has<WG2106> no<WG3756> pleasure<WG2106> in him.
But we are not of those who shrink<WG5289> back<WG5289> to destruction,<WG684> but of those who have faith<WG4102> to the preserving<WG4047> of the soul.<WG5590>
